summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 17018 entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Seattle Boulevard from Plummer Street to 9th Avenue South; 9th Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard on the north to Seattle Boulevard on the south; Seattle Boulevard from 9th Avenue South to 8th Avenue South; and 8th Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard to Court Street, all in the City of Seattle by replanking the same with plank 22 feet in length, all in accordance with Resolution No. 856 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle" approved September 26, 1907.
